3062CB0B56A74C26BA14D8B00D36F435.description:
Advanced: Demonstrate understanding
of relationships between music and the other
arts, other disciplines, varied contexts, and
daily life.

D10D5018376745509481457A82E065CC.description:
Accomplished: Demonstrate
understanding of relationships between
music and the other arts, other disciplines,
varied contexts, and daily life.

6914AE96C3814B70814E72089E8042A5.description:
Proficient: Demonstrate understanding
of relationships between music and the
other arts, other disciplines, varied contexts,
and daily life.

90765880A38A46929AB87314173BCE82.description:
Understanding connections to varied contexts and daily life enhances musicians’
creating, performing, and responding.

EB712D72A6B34C989459BE8E01DE570F.description: Connect #11: Relate musical ideas and work to varied contexts and daily life to deepen understanding.

1D7154E97F9A400DB68040DF350AAD36.description:
Advanced: Demonstrate how interests,
knowledge and skills relate to personal
choices and intent when creating, performing,
and responding to music.

3FFCDBD45A6E44F390201A4002B07891.description:
Accomplished: Demonstrate how
interests, knowledge, and skills relate to
personal choices and intent when
creating, performing, and responding to
music.

D2580562CE634A01912A6C3988FCB245.description:
Proficient: Demonstrate how interests,
knowledge, and skills relate to personal
choices and intent when creating,
performing, and responding to music.

47DD2AB7C7924E869F8CF9C111AA73CD.description:
Musicians connect their personal interests, experiences, ideas, and knowledge to
creating, performing, and responding.

5F434F65B5174F70BDF9ECCD6E522438.description: Connect #10: Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make music.

C38C70083BB345D1A4B4ACC15727272C.description:
Advanced: Describe and evaluate
ways in which critiquing others’ work and
receiving feedback from others have been
specifically applied in the personal creative
process.

59AA2F6E070F4622B87D15C7CE3AE1BA.description:
Advanced: Evaluate the effectiveness
of the technical and expressive aspects of
selected music and performances,
demonstrating understanding of theoretical
concepts and complex compositional
techniques and procedures.

782D1B9281614D9DBA0DCF85204D27E9.description:
Accomplished: Describe ways in which
critiquing others’ work and receiving
feedback from others have been
specifically applied in the personal
creative process.

FE4217BE67794D28922610D744E73521.description:
Accomplished: Explain the effectiveness
of the technical and expressive aspects
of selected music and performances,
demonstrating understanding of music
theory as well as compositional
techniques and procedures.

F8E60F6791124C95869C3E955CC95CF0.description:
Proficient: Describe the way(s) in which
critiquing others’ work and receiving
feedback from others can be applied in the
personal creative process.

92119299B6F847A9B7F4DDEFDB7F46DC.description:
Proficient: Describe the effectiveness of
the technical and expressive aspects of
selected music and performances,
demonstrating understanding of
fundamentals of music theory.

611029EF5ED74130868566DAB0E66318.description:
The personal evaluation of musical works and
performances is informed by analysis, interpretation, and established criteria.

EFF82AA842F44DA4947D73E07085EAEE.description: Evaluate: Support evaluations of musical works and performances based on analysis, interpretation, and established criteria.

AF694E9D7601404699C5261354778078.description:
Advanced: Develop, justify and defend
interpretations of varied works,
demonstrating an understanding of the
composers’ intent by citing the use of
elements of music (including form),
compositional techniques, and the
style/genre and context of each work.

3E3F546DEDB641A8AC9DC7279D923C6F.description:
Accomplished: Develop and support
interpretations of varied works,
demonstrating an understanding of the
composers’ intent by citing the use of
elements of music (including form),
compositional techniques, and the
style/genre and context of each work.

60046C956FAF48818CA56BB8165A653E.description:
Proficient: Develop and explain
interpretations of varied works,
demonstrating an understanding of the
composers’ intent by citing technical and
expressive aspects as well as the
style/genre of each work.

7D2AE26134E84BFBA093CAC96CA61D51.description:
Through their use of elements and structures of music, creators and
performers provide clues to their expressive intent.

E98976F25B744AD897EAC5340BD268BD.description: Interpret: Support interpretations of musical works that reflect creators’/performers’ expressive intent.

FAC37DBE23724CCF979E5E2F24D248B4.description:
Advanced: Analyze aurally and/or by
reading the scores of musical works the
elements of music (including form),
compositional techniques and
procedures, relating them to aesthetic
effectiveness, style, mood, and context;
and explain how the analysis provides
models for personal growth as composer,
performer, and/or listener.

275988F7628F41E59A1649BC001189BF.description:
Accomplished: Analyze aurally and/or
by reading the scores of musical works
the elements of music (including form),
compositional techniques and
procedures, relating them to style,
mood, and context; and explain how the
analysis provides models for personal
growth as composer, performer, and/or
listener.

3E1915DC697B45F3AF6CE1AED9BE6614.description:
Proficient: Analyze aurally the
elements of music (including form) of
musical works, relating them to style,
mood, and context, and describe how the
analysis provides models for personal
growth as composer, performer, and/or
listener.

7C513D69D7B040F693D8C05458B721DD.description:
Response to music is informed by analyzing context (social, cultural, and
historical) and how creators and performers manipulate the elements of music.

BD367C45381645E19B449E35A9B16D43.description: Analyze: Analyze how the structure and context of varied musical works inform the response.

4DB02C16C10847E5B16EEBBB24618F01.description:
Advanced: Apply researched or
personally-developed criteria to select
music that expresses personal experiences
and interests, visual images, concepts, texts,
or storylines in moderately complex or
complex forms, and describe and justify the
choice as models for composition.

8AD26A3CA54640A3B4341B0CBC6AB6E7.description:
Accomplished: Apply teacher-provided
or personally-developed criteria to
select music that expresses personal
experiences and interests, moods, visual
images, concepts, texts, or storylines in
simple or moderately complex forms,
and describe and defend the choices as
models for composition.

EA8F3BAF86E84D13B445305B48BD5492.description:
Proficient: Apply teacher-provided
criteria to select music that expresses a
personal experience, mood, visual image, or
storyline in simple forms (such as one-part,
cyclical, binary), and describe the choices
as models for composition.

11E010E283B54089A335303F50E33750.description:
Individuals’ selection of musical works is influenced by their
interests, experiences, understandings, and purposes.

A86834EADE314044B49D893586C50F38.description: Select: Choose music appropriate for a specific purpose or context.

229A0E20E76E4068883DC5144F30C9A2.description:
Advanced: Explain how compositions
are appropriate for a variety of audiences
and contexts, and how this will shape future
compositions.

6C90B725CC76411196DB910D90C22ED4.description:
Advanced: Share live or recorded
performances of works (both personal and
others’), and explain and/or demonstrate
understanding of how the expressive intent
of the music is conveyed.

151B3C86C63943EA8693E102F5947339.description:
Accomplished: Explain how
compositions are appropriate
for both audience and context,
and how this will shape future
compositions.

DFF497D3FFAD499C89A6E47F5621A923.description:
Accomplished: Share live or
recorded performances of
works (both personal and
others’), and explain how the
elements of music and
compositional techniques are
used to convey intent.

74520FDC322648CA9AB0418913D6EB80.description:
Proficient: Identify how compositions are
appropriate for an audience or context, and how this
will shape future compositions.

2B9CBD0A3E5F46379B0FE94BA80B9D8D.description:
Proficient: Share live or recorded performances
of works (both personal and others’), and explain how
the elements of music are used to convey intent.

73157009C1454AAD916540DDFFEA6146.description:
Musicians judge performance based on criteria that vary across time, place, and cultures.
The context and how a work is presented influence the audience response.

65DFD0FE058B4A26BD410EAE5989EE35.description: Present: Perform expressively, with appropriate interpretation and technical accuracy, and in a manner appropriate to the audience and context.

6D8A4DC404434CC6BF8DFD015536B7BB.description:
Advanced: Identify, compare, and
implement strategies for improving the
technical and expressive aspects of
multiple contrasting works.

A64532E016914545A66A3FC8273D2ECD.description:
Advanced: Using established criteria
and feedback, identify the ways in which
performances use compositional
techniques and convey the formal design,
style, and historical/cultural context of the
works.

58DFCC4E853C47A4B0E8DCAFDBD69054.description:
Advanced: Create rehearsal plans for
works, identifying the form, repetition and
variation within the form, compositional
techniques, and the style and historical or
cultural context of the work.

913D170D8E4E4B45A954F4AEDCB4DCCA.description:
Accomplished: Identify and implement
strategies for improving the technical and
expressive aspects of varied works.

612426D78A0941929DE13AD598DA230F.description:
Accomplished: Using established
criteria and feedback, identify the ways in
which performances convey the formal
design, style, and historical/cultural
context of the works.

04EA4D4AED2F423B943DA3AC3BEBAD80.description:
Accomplished: Create rehearsal plans for
works, identifying the form, repetition and
variation within the form, and the style and
historical or cultural context of the work.

8A1B4A9E0E4A43D8912A07C2324EB53F.description:
Proficient: Identify and implement
strategies for improving the technical and
expressive aspects of multiple works.

FE3455EA8DC24D5EACB83FBBE9F7E4D3.description:
Proficient: Using established criteria
and feedback, identify the way(s) in which
performances convey the elements of
music, style, and mood.

1F2E720D3236408A85E47702E7127606.description:
Proficient: Create rehearsal plans for
works, identifying repetition and variation
within the form.

3A09769B655D4F5580EAA54EC015E3E3.description:
To express their musical ideas, musicians analyze, evaluate, and refine their
performance over time through openness to new ideas, persistence, and the application of appropriate criteria.

719263BF639F47AA9CC1E34367F27523.description: Rehearse, Evaluate and Refine: Evaluate and refine personal and ensemble performances, individually or in collaboration with others.

B5C7EE871F80485D911E5C452DE77403.description:
Advanced: Develop interpretations of
works based on an understanding of the use
of elements of music (including form),
compositional techniques, style, function,
and context, explaining and justifying how
the interpretive choices reflect the creators’
intent.

C7C9C22671C345A2B0FAAF7E566F772A.description:
Accomplished: Develop interpretations
of works based on an understanding of the
use of elements of music, style, mood,
function, and context, explaining and
supporting how the interpretive choices
reflect the creators’ intent.

D5D5F62D8BD3487DBDE3C61E8B027A57.description:
Proficient: Develop interpretations of
works based on an understanding of the
use of elements of music, style, and
mood, explaining how the interpretive
choices reflect the creators’ intent.

A6160E4AEBF54C3588FBE756B19813F4.description:
Performers make interpretive decisions based on their understanding of
context and expressive intent.

33BD647B0FBF4AE0A750B2BBC5269BA9.description: Interpret: Develop personal interpretations that consider creators’ intent.

198E0DD795E24D25A8EA84FF89155B63.description:
Advanced: Analyze how the elements
of music (including form), and
compositional techniques of selected
works relate to the style, function, and
context, and explain and support the
analysis and its implications for rehearsal
and performance.

74B29B321AF442E9BBF5A85BDD7AFAE1.description:
Accomplished: Analyze how the
elements of music (including form) of
selected works relate to the style,
function, and context, and explain the
implications for rehearsal and
performance.

BB2FB3B1A8F44B4FACF48682B539DE9B.description:
Proficient: Analyze how the elements
of music (including form) of selected works
relate to style and mood, and explain the
implications for rehearsal or performance.

CDF43009E5DA4654AEEE79DC6D530C61.description:
Analyzing creators’ context and how they manipulate elements of
music provides insight into their intent and informs performance.

14174AEF97DC4908A968E984FC96D738.description: Analyze: Analyze the structure and context of varied musical works and their implications for performance.

3BE1AF84095D4A8E9351A3C27CA4571C.description:
Advanced: Identify and select specific
sections, movements, or entire works that
express personal experiences and interests,
moods, visual images, concepts, texts, or
storylines in moderately complex or
complex forms.

274BBA7B44594D708E5AEF0B5725B9A4.description:
Accomplished: Identify and select specific
passages, sections, or movements in
musical works that express personal
experiences and interests, moods, visual
images, concepts, texts, or storylines in
simple forms (such as binary, ternary,
rondo) or moderately complex forms.

B3EF7C20CD524CE8B8E190099E36FD7E.description:
Proficient: Identify and select specific
excerpts, passages, or sections in musical
works that express a personal experience,
mood, visual image, or storyline in simple
forms (such as one-part, cyclical, binary).

251369953DC447EDA285DE85078E9134.description:
Performers’ interest in and knowledge of musical work(s), understanding of their
own technical skill, and the context for a performance influence the selection of repertoire.

AF649B6D993E486DA913F259B47A2C44.description: Select: Select varied musical works to present based on interest, knowledge, technical skill, and context.

52022DCF9B1B459A9445CBA4FF2EC7A7.description:
Advanced: Describe a variety of
possible contexts and mediums for
presenting personal works, and explain and
compare how each could impact the success
of the final composition and presentation.

0BF1DAA83D9447D3AFCDE4FA97245A66.description:
Advanced: Share music through the
use of notation, solo or group performance,
or technology, and demonstrate and explain
how the elements of music, compositional
techniques and processes have been
employed to realize expressive intent.

E067BDEE566D48788561E793C24B1D02.description:
Accomplished: Describe the selected
contexts and performance mediums for
presenting personal works, and explain why
they successfully impact the final
composition and presentation.

AE80A680EB5F49718F0FF5CE57651A1C.description:
Accomplished: Share music through the
use of notation, solo or group performance,
or technology, and demonstrate and
describe how the elements of music and
compositional techniques have been
employed to realize expressive intent.

65FCA453914F43DBA9ECAF0E0176FEBF.description:
Proficient: Describe the given
context and performance medium for
presenting personal works, and how they
impact the final composition and
presentation.

DAC1D96700924AB098FC29161E44F82E.description:
Proficient: Share music through the
use of notation, performance, or
technology, and demonstrate how the
elements of music have been employed
to realize expressive intent.

C91A5528D3944A76BF2FFE17653E71C2.description:
Musicians’ presentation of creative work is the culmination of a process of
creation and communication.

5AA11443654D4841BAB2EF7BE2984775.description: Present: Share creative musical work that conveys intent, demonstrates craftsmanship, and exhibits originality.

B431D55402474961AA6F4761B108CB60.description:
Advanced: Research, identify, explain,
and apply personally-developed criteria to
assess and refine the technical and
expressive aspects of evolving drafts
leading to final versions.

B007628952F24CCD9DBE28567B86194B.description:
Accomplished: Identify, describe, and
apply selected teacher-provided or
personally-developed criteria to assess
and refine the technical and expressive
aspects of evolving drafts leading to final
versions.

4DEC1191A9A94C7ABAA01032CEEF999F.description:
Proficient: Identify, describe, and
apply teacher-provided criteria to
assess and refine the technical and
expressive aspects of evolving drafts
leading to final versions.

28B8466935BC49F3A95B37B63056A58C.description:
Musicians evaluate and refine their work through openness to new ideas,
persistence, and the application of appropriate criteria.

02AB24CBB81846219D509C3B0A7E06DA.description: Evaluate and Refine: Evaluate and refine selected musical ideas to create musical work that meets appropriate criteria.

0870FD29D2BC4D24A0B7EF39E915D5C3.description:
Advanced: Analyze and demonstrate
the development of sounds and extended
musical ideas in drafts of music within a
variety of moderately complex or complex
forms.

DB7CD83B8C764D51AB166AD9ECA63930.description:
Advanced: Assemble and organize
multiple sounds or extended musical ideas
to create initial expressive statements of
selected extended sonic experiences or
abstract ideas.

49E59AF47F0D49EC82EB9D68782263ED.description:
Accomplished: Describe and explain the
development of sounds and musical ideas
in drafts of music within a variety of simple
or moderately complex forms (such as
binary, rondo, or ternary).

0A8F5359993A4860887860EF0C05D8E1.description:
Accomplished: Assemble and organize
multiple sounds or musical ideas to create
initial expressive statements of selected
sonic events, memories, images, concepts,
texts, or storylines.

A4974D92C5684F008E9DA87AE457E955.description:
Proficient: Identify and describe the
development of sounds or short musical
ideas in drafts of music within simple
forms (such as one-part, cyclical, or
binary).

0F9A714CA7E24820BF0EEF067CA22EFB.description:
Proficient: Assemble and organize
sounds or short musical ideas to create
initial expressions of selected
experiences, moods, images, or
storylines.

1BF6FFABA331451CA9847E47223F4A29.description:
Musicians’ creative choices are influenced by their expertise, context, and
expressive intent.

B10A80BD5AD84A54B33FC38C25AF5C28.description: Plan and Make: Select and develop musical ideas for defined purposes and contexts.

C8C63E3443754F27AFA80172403C8D63.description:
Advanced: Describe and demonstrate
multiple ways in which sounds and musical
ideas can be used to represent extended
sonic experiences or abstract ideas.

F130EAAF69F2452E8B800C6B6B566B10.description:
Accomplished: Describe and demonstrate
how sounds and musical ideas can be used
to represent sonic events, memories, visual
images, concepts, texts, or storylines.

85C1EA172798455D85373EF35B4F9B5C.description:
Proficient: Describe how sounds and
short musical ideas can be used to
represent personal experiences, moods,
visual images, and/or storylines.

848F3B72C5E746B99268A0ADB2E3B6A0.description:
The creative ideas, concepts, and feelings that influence musicians’ work
emerge from a variety of sources.

AFC2BE8778C243BEADBCE506F2BA977B.description: Imagine: Generate musical ideas for various purposes and contexts.
